text: Ronald A. Irwin, (October 29, 1936 â€“ December 5, 2020) was a Canadian politician. He was born in Sault Ste. Marie, Ontario. He was a member of the Liberal Party. He was a member of the Canadian Parliament between 1980 to 1984 and again from 1993 to 1997. Irwin died on December 5, 2020 in Sault Ste. Marie at the age of 84.Ron Irwin passes away at age 84 ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Ambassadors of Canada Category:People from Sault Ste. title: Ron Irwin
